spec.collapsedText: "The Sony Xperia 1IV is Sony's product with a 6.5" screen size and for the first time in an Sony, it comes with a 120Hz ProMotion display for super smooth scrolling. The list of innovations includes a more capable triple camera setup, with a wide, ultra-wide and zoom cameras, as well as a LiDAR scanner.

comments.title: Great phone even better than s22 ultra
comments.comment:
Design: The usual Sony Xperia design is nothing new.
 Display: Beautiful 4k display and excellent color reproduction with 120hz but annoyingly it's only FHD if you're not watching videos or viewing photos.
 Battery: The largest battery ever on Xperia device and yes it does last you through the day.
 Camera: Probably the best camera I've used on a phone but the zoom camera it's not S22 ultra.
 Audio: Powerful front facing stereo speakers and there's a headphone jack.
 Software: Stock android 12 with few Sony apps and tweaks.
 Overheating issues: Used to overheat like crazy when shooting videos and regular photos, Sony released an update to fix the overheating about 50% but still overheats nonetheless but not that much now after the update.
 The Question is: should you buy it?
 The answer is: Yes if you want what is mentioned above, And No if you want a powerful zoom camera and can't tolerate with overheating issues.
